title: How to Sew Really Thick Fake Fur

steps.headline: Use a thicker needle, such as a furniture needle.
steps.description: These needles are designed for things that are thicker, which will make your item easier to sew.

steps.headline: Cut your pattern pieces out, allowing an extra quarter inch or so of seam allowance if this is your first time doing this.
Clip the fur short along the seam allowance.
Try a sewing machine.
steps.description: These machines help with sewing faster and are good with sewing various materials.

text: Use a thicker needle, such as a furniture needle. These needles are designed for things that are thicker, which will make your item easier to sew. Cut your pattern pieces out, allowing an extra quarter inch or so of seam allowance if this is your first time doing this.  Clip the fur short along the seam allowance.  Pin thoroughly.  Try a sewing machine. These machines help with sewing faster and are good with sewing various materials.
